ygData.subject: Vulois' destiny

Subject: Vulois' destiny

The explosion went off right beside Vulois. He could feel the pain 
beside him. He was dying. It was almost time. Mechfluid was spilling 
out of him. But than a voice, one of great mystique, spoke to him.

"It is all right. You will be fine."

Vulois blacked out, and that is when he magically dissapeared from 
Past Earth.

Vulois awkoke in a strange place. He could not understand where he 
was. Than he looked ahead. It was the voice who brought him here. The 
one who sent him to Earth in the first place: The Matrix! But that 
must mean......He's back on Cybertron! He could feel the Matrix 
calling him. He went up to it, and stepped inside.

In moments he was wisked away inside it. It spoke to him.

"You are now interfacing with the Oracle, the computer where the 
sparks of all who lived, or are going to live meet. Welcome Vulois"

"I don't understand. Why am I here?"

"Let The Oracle explain. What you saw before, in your last moments of 
Ranbis the Decepticon was fraud. You were not sent to Past Earth as 
Punishment, but for a reason. We want you to be our abassador. We 
want all of Cybertron to be Organic, and we want all the factions to 
unite and bring the organics to Cybertron and make new peace. We 
needed to send you before so you could be disgusted by the Predacon 
way. How they treated you. We want that to end. We want one faction, 
living Organically. You and three others are too start our peace 
group. You must build an embassy on neutral ground, and hold meetings 
to return to Cybertron under one organic faction that all 
Cybertronians will become. The three that you should work with are 
Soundwave, Battera and Cybershark. They might not say yes, but you 
must try to recruit them."

"What about Terminess? Was she killed?"

"She has served her purpose. We made sure she would go to Past Earth. 
Many of the things you did you could not have done without her. We 
have erased her memory and sent her back to her group."

"Than I will do it. Send me back to Past Earth!"

Vulois felt like he was going faster and faster, until bright light 
sone on him and he was gone.

When he regained sight, he was on Past Earth, on a huge X.

"This must be where I will build the embassy. By the Matrix, I will 
succeed!"

(All right, that ties up loose ends for my chars. Now I won't have to 
read a thousand messages when I come back from vacation. Please don't 
say you found my char or anything while I'm gone. I want to be there 
to re-act. I have grad tomorrow and vacation friday, so wish me luck! 
Goodbye everyone!)
